org.tms.api.io

Class XLSOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tms.io.options.BaseIOOptions<T>
      • org.tms.io.options.StyledPageIOOptions<XLSOptions>
        • org.tms.api.io.XLSOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseIOOption<XLSOptions>, StyleableIOOption<XLSOptions>

    public class XLSOptions
extends org.tms.io.options.StyledPageIOOptions<XLSOptions>
implements StyleableIOOption<XLSOptions>
    XLSOptions is a concrete class for representing configuration options to import and export Tables from/to MS Excel in xlsx or xls format.

    Since:
    "1.1"
    Version:
    "1.1"

    • Field Detail

      • Default

        public static final XLSOptions Default
        Constant with the most common MS Excel import and export configuration options already set. The values for the various configuration options are defined as follows:
        • Row Labels: true
        • Column Labels: true
        • Ignore Empty Rows: false
        • Ignore Empty Columns: false
        • Default Column Width: 65px
        • Default Font Size: 12px
        • File Format: xlsx
        • Interpret Blank Cells as Nulls: true
        • Import/Export Formulas/Derivations: true
        • Import/Export Comments/Descriptions: true

        To include these default values when exporting to MS Excel, simply include XLSOptions.Default in the import factory method or supporting TableElement export method.

        See Also:
        Table#export(String, BaseIOOption), Table#export(java.io.OutputStream, BaseIOOption), Row#export(String, BaseIOOption), Row#export(java.io.OutputStream, BaseIOOption), Column#export(String, BaseIOOption), Column#export(java.io.OutputStream, BaseIOOption), Subset#export(String, BaseIOOption), Subset#export(java.io.OutputStream, BaseIOOption)
